app.name: Youth Development Initiative
app.tagline: A municipality- and grant-ready youth development system for ages 7–20.

home.heroSubtitle: Operational system for scheduling, attendance, volunteers, governance, and reporting.
home.joinCommunitySubtitle: Whether you're a young person seeking growth, a parent looking for support, or someone who wants to contribute, there's a place for you here.
home.volunteerDesc: Share your skills and time to make a difference
home.mentorDesc: Guide and inspire the next generation
home.partnerDesc: Collaborate as a school, club, or organization
home.missionTitle: Built on Trust, Committed to Excellence
home.missionBody: Operating under the Made By Young Hands youth development model, we connect schools, sports clubs, families, and community partners into a unified system that tracks development, participation, and long-term outcomes.
home.missionStandards: Our platform meets the rigorous standards reviewed by municipalities, Vinnova, schools, sports federations, corporate sponsors, and NGOs across Sweden.
home.programsSubtitle: Comprehensive pathways designed to support every aspect of youth development, from academic achievement to personal growth.

about.title: About
about.missionBody:
We develop young people through structured, safeguarded pathways that combine education support, girls' sports retention (with a strong focus on football), creative skills development, and mentorship.

Operating under the Made By Young Hands youth development model, we connect schools, sports clubs, families, and community partners into a unified system that tracks participation, personal development, and long-term outcomes, with specific emphasis on social inclusion for youth from foreign-background and under-resourced communities.

Our platform is designed to meet governance, safeguarding, and transparency standards reviewed by municipalities, VGFF/SVFF, Vinnova, schools, corporate sponsors, and youth development organizations across Sweden.

values.youthFirstDesc: Every decision we make prioritizes the wellbeing, development, and future of the young people we serve.
values.inclusiveDesc: We create safe, ambitious environments for girls and boys, including youth from foreign-background and under-resourced communities.
values.communityDesc: We connect schools, clubs, families, municipalities, and sponsors into one coordinated support system.
values.impactDesc: We track participation, attendance, and progress so partners can see outcomes and long-term value.

programs.title: Our Programs
programs.subtitle: Our programs are designed as connected pathways. Participants can join at any stage and progress over time.
programs.socialIntegrationTitle: Social Integration & Belonging Through Sport & Creativity
programs.socialIntegrationSubtitle: (Youth with Foreign Background / New in Sweden)
programs.socialIntegrationDescription: This program supports young people from migrant, refugee, and foreign-background families by using sports and creative work as tools for integration, language development, and social belonging.
programs.creativeSkillsDescription: Workshops that build confidence, collaboration, and practical skills. These sessions complement sport and education pathways.
programs.schoolSupportDescription: Homework support, study planning, and structured guidance for ages 7–15. Sessions are designed to complement school routines and help participants build consistent habits.
programs.footballDescription: Training pathways for boys and girls across ages 7–20 with a strong focus on long-term retention, confidence, and healthy performance culture.
programs.mentorshipDescription: Mentor circles and guidance sessions for ages 15–20, focused on goals, education pathways, leadership, and safe decision-making.

activities.title: Activities Calendar
activities.subtitle: Training and development sessions across Trollhättan and Vänersborg (including Sjuntorp, Vargön, Bråland and Mellerud), with planned growth toward Uddevalla, Grästorp and across Västra Götaland.
activities.setupHint: Make sure your Supabase project is configured and the schema in supabase/schema.sql has been applied.
activities.missingEnvBody: Add VITE_SUPABASE_URL and VITE_SUPABASE_PUBLISHABLE_KEY to your .env file and restart the dev server.
activities.emptyBody: Sign in as an admin to add activities, or load sample data to get started.
activities.safeguardingGateTitle: Acknowledge the safeguarding policy to RSVP
activities.safeguardingGateBody: To protect children and youth, a digital safeguarding acknowledgement is required before RSVP/attendance actions are allowed.

auth.title: Sign In
auth.staffNote: Staff accounts are controlled by admins. Use an invite code to register.

admin.title: Admin Dashboard
admin.subtitle: Exports and compliance oversight (safeguarding acknowledgements, RSVP non-responders).
admin.locationHint: Leave blank to match all locations for this program type.
admin.shareSecurely: Share the code securely with the intended recipient.

staff.title: Staff Portal
staff.subtitle: Tools for volunteers, staff, and board members: activities, participants, and reporting.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Whether you're a parent, potential volunteer, partner organization, or sponsor, we'd love to hear from you. Reach out and let's discuss how we can work together.
contact.responseTimeValue: We aim to respond within 48 hours
contact.sendMessageDesc: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you shortly.
contact.subject: Subject
